verses.roman:
"ihāṅ āilāṅ prabhure dekhi' duḥkha khaṇḍāite
yebā mane, tāhā prabhu nā dilā karite

synonyms: ihāṅ—here (to Jagannātha Purī); āilāṅ—I have come; prabhure—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dekhi'-by seeing; duḥkha khaṇḍāite—to diminish my unhappiness; yebā mane—what was in my mind; tāhā—that; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nā dilā karite—did not allow me to do.
translation: "I came here to diminish my unhappiness by seeing Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, but the Lord did not allow me to execute what was in my mind.
